Name: Neighbor Fight
About the game: Join the Discord server and tell me about your experiences, so the game can be improved accordingly! DESTROY THE HOUSE OF YOUR NEIGHBOR To accomplish this you need the perfect strategy and find balance between making money and destruction. Grow Cannabis in your Shed. Enslave Hire Aliens to Work for You. Process Weed into a Variety of Products. Sell Products to Customers to Make Money. Buy Upgrades and Machines from your Phone. Throw Furniture and other Objects at your Neighbor's House. Craft new Powerful Objects in the Furnicombinator. Brew Potions for Crafting or to Power Machines. Watch Out for Thieves Stealing your Orders. Call the Police on your Neighbor. Make sure your own House isn't Burning to the Ground while you're Busy. And so much more! Game Modes Online Casual 1v1 [AVAILABLE] Casual 2v2 [TO COME] Tournament [TO COME] Free-for-All [TO COME] Practice Tutorial [AVAILABLE] Play Against AI [TO COME]
